sentences.english: Mei Shan middle school, is the first class school of Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 梅山中学，是广东省一级学校。

sentences.english: This system has been working well since its operation in the Meishan Iron Mine factory.
sentences.chinese: 该系统已成功应用于上海梅山铁矿选矿厂磨矿车间。

sentences.english: Meishan lies in the middle of Hunan province.
The present situation of grinding and classification and the principles of micro-stage grinding technique of Meishan Mine are described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了梅山磨矿分级现状和微阶段化磨矿技术原理。

sentences.english: The application of the micro-stage grinding technique in the Meishan concentrating plant is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了微阶段化磨矿技术在梅山选厂的应用情况。
